lom:description.lom:string: This website is the home of Caltech's geological and planetary sciences library system. It is a collection of materials in the fields of Earth and planetary geology, geophysics, geochemistry, seismology, earthquakes, and paleontology. Links to sites for each of these subjects are provided, as well as links to agencies, databases, glossaries, other libraries, online journals, organizations, publishers, and specific subject information.

lom:title.lom:string: Geological and Planetary Sciences Library at Caltech (title provided or enhanced by cataloger)
